Endstations
============

.. Simple CXLS/CXFEL buttons.
.. raw:: html

    <div class="custom-buttons">
        <a href="../index.html" class="button">Access CXLS Docs</a>
        <a href="../../cxfel/index.html" class="button">Access CXFEL Docs</a>
    </div>

Inside of this page you will find the documentation for the endstations at CXLS and CXFEL. The endstations are the experimental stations where the users will perform their experiments. The endstations are equipped with different detectors and sample environments.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   endstations
   area_detector
   cxls_eiger_4m


Introduction
------------
